name: Printed Graphic Swim Shorts
shortDescription: These vibrant swim shorts have a fresh and sporty vibe with a graphic Monogram Scarf print reminiscent of sailing pennants. Inspired by the Louis Vuitton 37th America’s Cup, this piece is signed with a sporty rubber Gaston signature on the left leg and can be worn out of the water for a casual beach look.
detailedDescription:
• 100% polyamide
  • Blue
  • Regular fit
  • All-over Monogram Scarf print
  • Gaston rubber signature on left leg
  • Elasticated waist with eyelets and drawcord
  • 2 side pockets
  • Mesh lining
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product care
panelInformations.description:
• Maximum washing temperature 30°C
  • Mild process
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Do not iron
  • Do not dry clean
  • Dry flat
  • Machine wash very gently at 30°C
  • Wash inside out in a net
  • Protect the accessories before cleaning
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :

name: Technical Swim Shorts
shortDescription: These vibrant royal blue swim shorts make a graphic statement with an all-over Damier print incorporating ‘Marque L. Vuitton déposée’ signatures and an LV Cup rubber patch on the right leg. Constructed from technical stretch nylon, this piece has welded and taped seams for a smooth finish as well as an adjustable drawstring waist.
detailedDescription:
• 81% polyamide, 19% elastane
  • Blue
  • Regular fit
  • All-over digital Damier print incorporating ‘Marque L. Vuitton déposée’ signatures
  • Rubber patch with LV Cup logo on right leg
  • Metal cord ends with LV signatures
  • Drawstring waist with four eyelets
  • Patch pocket on right leg
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product care
panelInformations.description:
• Maximum washing temperature 30°C
  • Mild process
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Do not iron
  • Do not dry clean
  • Dry flat
  • Machine wash very gently at 30°C
  • Wash inside out in a net
  • Protect the accessories before cleaning
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :

name: Printed Nylon Swim Shorts
shortDescription: These graphic swim shorts are printed with a Damier Pacific motif in vibrant blue tones. The tropical design inspired by a moonlit beach features discreetly integrated Monogram Flower signatures and a smart Damier trim. This summery clothing piece can be worn out of the water paired with items in the same motif for a bold holiday look.
detailedDescription:
• 100% polyester
  • Blue
  • Regular fit
  • All-over Damier Pacific print
  • Elasticated waist
  • 2 side pockets
  • 1 patch pocket at the back
  • Made in Italy
  • Maximum washing temperature 30°C

name: Monogram Nylon Swim Board Shorts
shortDescription: These iconic board shorts are in a vibrant seasonal colour for a bold effect on the water’s edge. They are made from a technical quick-drying fabric distinguished with an all-over embossed Monogram Constellation motif. An engraved staple on the back adds a discreet final signature.
detailedDescription:
• 100% polyester
  • Orange
  • Regular fit
  • Embossed all-over Monogram Constellation jacquard
  • Engraved staple at the back
  • Elasticated drawstring waist
  • Side pockets
  • Made in Italy
  • Maximum washing temperature 30°C
  • Mild process
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Do not iron
  • Do not dry clean
  • Drip flat drying
  • Machine wash very gently at 30°C
  • Wash inside out in a net
  • No ironing

name: Monogram Nylon Swim Shorts
shortDescription: These graphic swim shorts are printed with a Monogram Sand Beach motif in fresh beige and coral tones. The all-over pattern, inspired by a tropical island paradise, mixes iconic symbols such as surfboards and flowers with Monogram signatures. Out of the water, these shorts can be paired with easy T-shirts for an effortless holiday look.

  • Beige

name: Printed Nylon Swim Shorts
shortDescription: These summery swim shorts in vibrant blue-green tones are distinguished with a fresh all-over Damier Monogram print incorporating micro Monogram details in alternate squares and ‘Marque L.Vuitton déposée’ signatures. Out of the water, this piece can be paired with a t-shirt or shirt in the same motif for a casual graphic look.
detailedDescription:

  • Teal
  • Regular fit
  • Damier Monogram all-over print
  • Drawstring elasticated waist

name: Signature Swim Board Shorts
shortDescription: Featuring a longer fit, these summery shorts offer a new option for beachwear. Available in a choice of navy and electric blue along with the season’s signature orange, they are tailored from constellation Monogram fabric with a textured finish. Engraved Louis Vuitton staples on the back supply the finishing touch.
detailedDescription:
• 100% polyester
  • Blue
  • Model wears an FR size M
  • Model measurements: chest 83 cm/33 inches, height 182 cm/6 feet
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• 30°C gentle machine wash
  • Wash inside out in a net
  • No ironing

name: 3D Pocket Monogram Board Shorts
shortDescription: Now available in seasonal orange, these 3D Pocket Monogram Board Shorts bring a distinctive twist to swimwear. Tailored from embossed Monogram fabric with a textured effect, they feature a distinctive 3D pocket detail. Details include a white drawstring, tone-on-tone eyelets and a signed palladium staple on the back.
detailedDescription:
• 100% polyester
  • Blue
  • Model wears a FR size M
  • Model measurements: chest 83 cm/33 inches, height 182 cm/6 feet
  • Made in Italy
